entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers beginning late this evening. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 except southeast 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
